headline: Compared to Estimates, Diamondback (FANG) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Diamondback (FANG) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended June 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Diamondback Energy (FANG) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Diamondback (FANG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.52% and +11.82%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Diamondback Energy (FANG) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Diamondback (FANG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.52% and +11.82%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Diamondback: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MIDLAND, Texas (AP) — Diamondback Energy Inc. FANG) on Monday reported second-quarter earnings of $699 million. The Midland, Texas-based company said it had net income of $2.38 per share.

raw.headline: Diamondback: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: MIDLAND, Texas (AP) — Diamondback Energy Inc. FANG) on Monday reported second-quarter earnings of $699 million. The Midland, Texas-based company said it had net income of $2.38 per share.

headline: Letter to Stockholders Issued by Diamondback Energy, Inc
summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diamondback Stockholders, This letter is meant to be a supplement to our earnings release and is being furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and released to our stockholders simultaneously with our earnings release. Please see the information regarding forward-looking statements and non-GAAP financial information included at the end of this letter. Before we begin, we are deeply saddened by the tragic Texas flooding last month

raw.headline: Letter to Stockholders Issued by Diamondback Energy, Inc

Please see the information regarding forward-looking statements and non-GAAP financial information included at the end of this letter. Before we begin, we are deeply saddened by the tragic Texas flooding last month

headline: Diamondback Energy, Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial and Operating Results
summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: FANG) (“Diamondback” or the “Company”) today announced financial and operating results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025. SECOND QUARTER 2025 AND RECENT HIGHLIGHTS Average oil production of 495.7 MBO/d (919.9 MBOE/d)Net cash provided by operating activities of $1.7 billion; Operating Cash Flow Before Working Capital Changes (as defined and reconciled below) of $2.1 billionCash capital expenditures of $86

raw.headline: Diamondback Energy, Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial and Operating Results
raw.summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: FANG) (“Diamondback” or the “Company”) today announced financial and operating results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025. SECOND QUARTER 2025 AND RECENT HIGHLIGHTS Average oil production of 495.7 MBO/d (919.9 MBOE/d)Net cash provided by operating activities of $1.7 billion; Operating Cash Flow Before Working Capital Changes (as defined and reconciled below) of $2.1 billionCash capital expenditures of $86

headline: Viper Energy, Inc., a Subsidiary of Diamondback Energy, Inc., Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial and Operating Results
summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Viper Energy, Inc., (NASDAQ:VNOM) (“Viper” or the “Company”), a subsidiary of Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) (“Diamondback”), today announced financial and operating results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025. SECOND QUARTER HIGHLIGHTS Q2 2025 average production of 41,615 bo/d (79,286 boe/d)Q2 2025 consolidated net income (including non-controlling interest) of $84 million; net income attributable to Viper of $37 million, or $0.28

raw.headline: Viper Energy, Inc., a Subsidiary of Diamondback Energy, Inc., Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial and Operating Results
raw.summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Viper Energy, Inc., (NASDAQ:VNOM) (“Viper” or the “Company”), a subsidiary of Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) (“Diamondback”), today announced financial and operating results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025. SECOND QUARTER HIGHLIGHTS Q2 2025 average production of 41,615 bo/d (79,286 boe/d)Q2 2025 consolidated net income (including non-controlling interest) of $84 million; net income attributable to Viper of $37 million, or $0.28

headline: Diamondback CEO: US Shale Oil Remains Stunted by ‘Macro Uncertainty’
summary: Diamondback CEO Kaes Van’t Hof says Permian shale growth remains stalled as global oil supply rises—including with recent output increases announced by OPEC+.

raw.headline: Diamondback CEO: US Shale Oil Remains Stunted by ‘Macro Uncertainty’
